Description:
Our client is a leading Insurance company. They are now looking for a  to join them. Roles & Responsibilities:Manage large amounts of inbound and outbound calls in a timely manner
Follow communication “scripts” when handling different topics
Identify customers’ needs, clarify information, research every issue and provide solutions and/or alternatives
Build sustainable relationships and engage customers by taking the extra mile
Keep records of all conversations in the database in a comprehensible waySkills
Skills:
Preferred Insurance domain experience
Preferred immediate joiners
Track record of over-achieving quota
Customer focus and adaptability to different personality types
Ability to multi-task, set priorities and manage time effectively

Previous experience in a customer support role
Strong phone and verbal communication skills along with active listening
Familiarity with CRM systems and practices
